item.title: XY Utilities v1.4.0.17
item.description:
Product: XY Utilities v1.4.0.17
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 12 Mar 2021 15:51:34 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Utilities for working with XY-data type (Cluster of 1D X and Y arrays).

Supported methods:
- <b>Arithmetic</b>: Add, Subtract, Multiply, Divide, Square
- <b>Array</b>: Sort, Reverse, Decimate, Decimate Array, Subset, Swap X and Y, Get X and Y, Append, Restrict X Range, Remove Outliers
- <b>Signal Processing</b>: Derivative, Average, Moving Average, Interpolate, Interpolate Parameter, Resample, FFT Spectrum, FFT Power Spectrum, Symmetrize
- <b>Filters</b>: Zero Phase Low Pass, Savitsky-Golay,
- <b>Conversion</b>: Waveform to XY, XY to Waveform, 2D to XY, XY to 2D

Release Notes: Note: Some terminals have changed to make more constitent. (e.g. unit selector always on same terminal across methods)

New Methods
- Peak Detector.vi
- Flatten.vi

Changes
- More consitent treatment of data and points units
- Note: Some terminals have changed to make more constitent. (e.g. unit selector always on same terminal across always methods)
- Some folder rearrangement

Bug Fixes
- Data <--> Points conversion
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Graph Utilities v2.1.3.5
item.description:
Product: Graph Utilities v2.1.3.5
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 10 Mar 2021 18:18:18 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Misc. graph utilities

Release Notes: [2.1.3]
- Change behavior of Array to Offset and Multiplier. Now calculates multiplier by (x[N-1] - x[0])/(N-1), where N is the length of the array.
- XY Graph to Intensity Graph now calls XY to 2D from XY_utilities package
- Make VIs preallocated reentrant, remove automatic error handling, remove debugging
- Add documentation
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: postgreSQL/timescaleDB/S3 v1.3.1.19
item.description:
Product: postgreSQL/timescaleDB/S3 v1.3.1.19
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 05 Mar 2021 11:12:10 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin, Jack Maier, Phil Shenk

Description: VIs for interacting with postgreSQL /TimescaleDB/S3

Release Notes: - Fix issues with number formatting:
- Issue #65: Coerce infinite. Numbers larger than +/-1E22 are represented as '+/- Infinity'
- Issue #68: double format. Numbers are now converted with 15 digits of precision (smallest possible number is 1E-15; previously smallest number was 1E-6)
- Issue #69: integer format. All supported integers were converted to 'NaN'
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Instrument Framework v1.8.3.100
item.description:
Product: Instrument Framework v1.8.3.100
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Thu, 25 Feb 2021 13:22:19 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: An object-oriented framework based on JKI SMOs, developed by the LevyLab at the University of Pittsburgh

An Instrument developed using this framework will have the access to the following capabilities:

- Method for communicate with a piece of hardware (provides a hardware abstraction layer (HAL))
- Periodically polls the instrument for its settings and logs them to a PGSQL database
- Defines an API to allow external programs to control compiled instances of the application and remotely across a network (Either National Instruments' Simple Messaging Library (STM) or cross-platform protocol 0MQ)
- Provide a user interface (optional but probably desirable).
- Methods for reading and writing configuration from disk.

The LevyLab Instrument Framework makes extensive use of JKI State Machines and JKI State Machine Objects.z

Release Notes: [1.8.3]
- Improvments to Configuration.lvclass:
- Bug fix Issue #32: Better handling of config files that have multiple sections
- Read method now drops onto block diagram with data to variant included
- New method "Default Path" provides path to User Application Data
- [build 100: remove missing file from configuration.lvclass]
item.dc:creator: Levylab
